sn47.37:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn47.37:4.4: Tassa kāye kāyānupassino viharato yo kāyasmiṃ chando so pahīyati.
sn47.37:5.1: Vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn47.37:5.2: Tassa vedanāsu vedanānupassino viharato yo vedanāsu chando so pahīyati.
sn47.37:6.1: Citte cittānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn47.37:6.2: Tassa citte cittānupassino viharato yo cittamhi chando so pahīyati.
sn47.37:7.1: Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn47.37:7.2: Tassa dhammesu dhammānupassino viharato yo dhammesu chando so pahīyati.
